WorkItem.Description:
When updating the item cache from wowhead or the armory while using a different language than English, many effects are lost. This is handled in ProcessEquipLine in SpecialEffects.cs.
 
Either:
 
- Implement foreign language texts in this function (might be moved to an external text file that can be translated by other people).
or
- Do not override on use effects of trinkets when changing the language. (Does not solve all problems, look at "Increases spell power by".)
or
- At least display a warning about this when changing the language.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Special effects on foreign language wowhead/armory updates

Comments.Message: Until someone gives us all the translations for the equip lines, we can't do anything about this.
